title.rendered: The VINE Rant: Opportunities in 2020. Is now a good time to become a Mortgage Agent?

content.rendered: Our first ever VINE Rant recorded at the new Vine Group office in Yaletown, Vancouver! Hugo Dos Reis chats with Stephen Appiah, Vine Group Mortgage Broker, about the subtle differences between his Ontario and British Columbia business, how technology has made things easier this year, and advice for those thinking of becoming a Mortgage Agent amidst the uncertainty of 2020.
